entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning early this morning and ending near noon then 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Ontario this morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
